comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:8.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0.1
Build ID: 20111120135848

Steps to reproduce:

Observe "dom-storage2-changed" (I do this in an extension).
Navigate to a page with sessionStorage items.
Restart Firefox session.


Actual results:

Notifications are received as the sessionStorage items are restored, but the url attributes are all empty.


Expected results:

Notifications received but the url attributes indicate the scope of the sessionStorage item being changed.

comments.raw_text: Later events for restored sessionStorage items, such as deleting them, also do not have the url set.
comments.text: Later events for restored sessionStorage items, such as deleting them, also do not have the url set.

comments.raw_text: No storage events generated by clear() actions have a URL set.  Very inefficient when everybody gets an event but can't tell if it is relevant.
comments.text: No storage events generated by clear() actions have a URL set.  Very inefficient when everybody gets an event but can't tell if it is relevant.
